attributes.title: No❤️ just no❤️
attributes.review: This is a trash app it took up most my storage🤬And the app no is awful 😡 And why would an Orange have a app I need answers🤬Plus if you support this racist, homophobic, Narcissistic, Islam phobic,pro-life you are the scum of the earth 🌎 😘 the red face doesn’t approve of this app and the Orange 👹

attributes.title: FAKE NEWS
attributes.review: this app is full of the the “fake news” that trump is trying to say the liberals are?!? i don’t understand why people would download this app with everything fake it shows! don’t download and don’t vote for this clown

Do I really have to say much i got the app and sense the being it was just TRULY TERRIBLE it had many glitches ✨and just not a good app👎 at all I really hope 😌you listen to this and not get the app it was a terrible experience 😡🤬

attributes.title: Review
attributes.review: I absolutely found this app to be non helpful, I feel like Donald Trump didn’t end up doing half the things he was going to do during his campaign. And he’s been lying to us and this app just proves it. Very disappointed

attributes.title: This doesn’t even deserve to have one star
attributes.review: This app is the worst I’ve ever had. It glitches, it steals money from my bank account without me knowing or authorization from me. If I can give it no stars I would.

attributes.title: worst app
attributes.review: I downloaded this app thinking that it was gonna be a smooth running app that I can vote on but no it was so laggy like I couldn’t even make it through the starting of the app opening and I have a iPhone11

attributes.title: Absolutely the Worst
attributes.review: This app is so terrible I don’t even think there is a word to describe it. I hope that everyone is able to see that this is not the kind of president who should lead our country. #biden2020

attributes.title: I changed my mind
attributes.review: This app is the worst app I’ve ever downloaded. Especially since it has to face of the worst president we’ve ever had. No point in having this app on your phone or even available. Kisses xoxo

attributes.title: DONT DO IT
attributes.review: I went to this app to try and see my president Barack Obama but all I kept seeing was this orange chicken. I felt heartbroken seeing someone mock the president. It kicked me the face twice and broke my and my grandmother’s back and now I can’t go to college. This app ruined my life.

attributes.title: Just terrible
attributes.review: This app doesn’t help me vote him for president. It took way to long to download. I hate the fact that he might ban almost the biggest platform me can communicate, with other creators. That’s why this app gets 1 Star.
